sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PSNL0310 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , APPMT_SEIL_NUM , APPMT_DIV_CD , APPMT_DT , BFR_DEPT_CD , BFR_BUSIN_CD , BFR_TYP_OCCU_DIV_CD , BFR_ODTY_DIV_CD , BFR_PYSP_CD , BFR_PYSP_GRDE_CD , BFR_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , AFT_DEPT_CD , AFT_BUSIN_CD , AFT_TYP_OCCU_DIV_CD , AFT_ODTY_DIV_CD , AFT_PYSP_CD , AFT_PYSP_GRDE_CD , AFT_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , APPMT_FIX_YN , CONFRTN_PRTC_DT , CONFRTN_PRCS_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #appmtSeilNum# , #appmtDivCd# , #appmtDt# , #bfrDeptCd# , #bfrBusinCd# , #bfrTypOccuDivCd# , #bfrOdtyDivCd# , #bfrPyspCd# , #bfrPyspGrdeCd# , #bfrLogSvcYrNumCd# , #aftDeptCd# , #aftBusinCd# , #aftTypOccuDivCd# , #aftOdtyDivCd# , #aftPyspCd# , #aftPyspGrdeCd# , #aftLogSvcYrNumCd# , #appmtFixYn# , #confrtnPrtcDt# , #confrtnPrcsYn# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PSNL0310 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , APPMT_SEIL_NUM=#appmtSeilNum# , APPMT_DIV_CD=#appmtDivCd# , APPMT_DT=#appmtDt# , BFR_DEPT_CD=#bfrDeptCd# , BFR_BUSIN_CD=#bfrBusinCd# , BFR_TYP_OCCU_DIV_CD=#bfrTypOccuDivCd# , BFR_ODTY_DIV_CD=#bfrOdtyDivCd# , BFR_PYSP_CD=#bfrPyspCd# , BFR_PYSP_GRDE_CD=#bfrPyspGrdeCd# , BFR_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD=#bfrLogSvcYrNumCd# , AFT_DEPT_CD=#aftDeptCd# , AFT_BUSIN_CD=#aftBusinCd# , AFT_TYP_OCCU_DIV_CD=#aftTypOccuDivCd# , AFT_ODTY_DIV_CD=#aftOdtyDivCd# , AFT_PYSP_CD=#aftPyspCd# , AFT_PYSP_GRDE_CD=#aftPyspGrdeCd# , AFT_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD=#aftLogSvcYrNumCd# , APPMT_FIX_YN=#appmtFixYn# , CONFRTN_PRTC_DT=#confrtnPrtcDt# , CONFRTN_PRCS_YN=#confrtnPrcsYn# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND APPMT_SEIL_NUM=#appmtSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PSNL0310 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND APPMT_SEIL_NUM=#appmtSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , APPMT_SEIL_NUM , APPMT_DIV_CD , APPMT_DT , BFR_DEPT_CD , BFR_BUSIN_CD , BFR_TYP_OCCU_DIV_CD , BFR_ODTY_DIV_CD , BFR_PYSP_CD , BFR_PYSP_GRDE_CD , BFR_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , AFT_DEPT_CD , AFT_BUSIN_CD , AFT_TYP_OCCU_DIV_CD , AFT_ODTY_DIV_CD , AFT_PYSP_CD , AFT_PYSP_GRDE_CD , AFT_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , APPMT_FIX_YN , CONFRTN_PRTC_DT , CONFRTN_PRCS_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PSNL0310 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND APPMT_SEIL_NUM=#appmtSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , APPMT_SEIL_NUM , APPMT_DIV_CD , APPMT_DT , BFR_DEPT_CD , BFR_BUSIN_CD , BFR_TYP_OCCU_DIV_CD , BFR_ODTY_DIV_CD , BFR_PYSP_CD , BFR_PYSP_GRDE_CD , BFR_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , AFT_DEPT_CD , AFT_BUSIN_CD , AFT_TYP_OCCU_DIV_CD , AFT_ODTY_DIV_CD , AFT_PYSP_CD , AFT_PYSP_GRDE_CD , AFT_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , APPMT_FIX_YN , CONFRTN_PRTC_DT , CONFRTN_PRCS_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PSNL0310 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , APPMT_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PSNL0310 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
